name: nudge-creative-assistant
description: Creative Assistant - AI-powered design inspiration and project management with Chrome extension and webapp

scripts.extension:setup: echo 'Setting up Creative Assistant Chrome Extension...' && cd creative-assistant-extension && echo '1. Copy env.template to config.js' && echo '2. Update config.js with your Supabase credentials' && echo '3. Load extension in Chrome: chrome://extensions/ -> Developer mode -> Load unpacked'
scripts.db:populate: cd initialize && echo '1. Copy template files: cp *.template.js *.js' && echo '2. Update credentials in .js files' && echo '3. Run: npm run populate-projects && npm run populate-assets && npm run assign-projects'
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd webapp && npm install && cd ../initialize && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run webapp:setup && npm run extension:setup
